The operator of Walleys Quarry landfill says its tests show it is 'not possible' that ‚Äòhydrogen sulphide contamination‚Äô is coming from its #Silverdale site. Red Industries say it is 'associated with ground water'.

tweets.text:
The Radcliffe and Redvales #Flooding Newsletter for March 2021 is now available to download from The Flood Hub: https://t.co/ttXc4Hsvq2 

It contains info from @EnvAgencyNW on phases 1 & 2 of the scheme and how you can speak to the team, and an update from @BuryCouncil. https://t.co/5Lc2bGWIYr
